name: STARTA TOKEN (STK)
description:
This is our **Utility & Governance Token**. The **STK** is the fuel of the **Starta Platform** and is an evolution of our **Exclusive Members Club**. Holders will be able to use it in **purchases**, **games**, **proposals** and **voting** on our platform. **Maximum supply is limited in the contract to 1,000,000,000**.

It will follow the **ERC1115 Standard** and is in the process of finalizing development and the whitelist is not yet defined.
